original: Löfgren, Åke Bernhard, tandläkare, Göteborg, f. 1/1/08 i Bengtsfors, Älvsb. 1., av köpm. Petrus L. o. Emma Johans-son. G. 32 m. Greta Dahlman. Barn: Björn f. 37, Catharina 39. — Stud:ex. i Karlstad 26, tandl :kand. 29, tandl. 31. Assist, i Kungsbacka 31, skoltandl. i Gbg 32-34, därefter prakt, där.
translated: Löfgren, Åke Bernhard, dentist, Gothenburg, b. 1/1/1908 in Bengtsfors, Älvsborg County, son of merchant Petrus L. and Emma Johansson. Married in 1932 to Greta Dahlman. Children: Björn b. 1937, Catharina b. 1939. Completed secondary school in Karlstad in 1926, graduated as a dentist in 1929, became a licensed dentist in 1931. Worked as an assistant in Kungsbacka in 1931, school dentist in Gothenburg from 1932 to 1934, and then established a private practice there.
